13#ifndef _TH_RAND_H_
14#define _TH_RAND_H_
15
16#include "th_types.h"
17/* Function: rand_init
18 Call this function to initialize a random number generator.
19*/
20void *rand_init(e_u32 seed, e_u32 reseed, e_f64 min, e_f64 max);
21void *rand_intparts_init(e_u32 seed, e_u32 reseed,
22 e_s32 mantsign,
23 e_s32 expsign,
24 e_u32 exp_cut,
25 e_u32 manthigh_cut,
26 e_u32 mantlow_cut);
27
28/* Function: rand_fini
29 Call this function to destroy a random number generator.
30*/
31void rand_fini(void *r);
32/* Function: random_u32
33 Call this function to get a 32b random integer.
34*/
35e_u32 random_u32(void *pr);
36e_u32 random_u32_inrange(void *pr, e_u32 min, e_u32 max);
37e_u32 *random_u32_vector(e_u32 size, e_u32 seed);
38e_u8 *random_u8_vector(e_u32 size, e_u32 seed);
39
40/* Function: random_f64_01
41 Call this function to get a floating point random integer in the range [0..1].
42*/
43e_f64 random_f64_01(void *pr);
44/* Function: random_f64_01
45 Call this function to get a floating point random integer
46 in the range min/max as initialized for the RNG.
47*/
48e_f64 random_f64(void *pr);
49/* Function: random_f64_vector
50 Create a vector based on RNG that was previously allocated
51 */
52e_f64 *random_f64_vector(int N,void *pr);
53/* Function: mixed_f64_vector
54 Create a vector with random values in 4 ranges ([-1e-10..1e-10],[1e20..1e40],[-1e6..1e6],[-1e40..1e40])
55*/
56e_f64 *mixed_f64_vector(int N, e_u32 seed);
57/* Function: fromint_f64_vector
58 Create a vector with random values in 4 ranges using integer math only
59*/
60e_f64 *fromint_f64_vector(int N, e_u32 seed);
61e_f32 *fromint_f32_vector(int N, e_u32 seed);
62/* Function: fromint_f64_01_vector
63 Create a vector with random values in 4 ranges using integer math only. All values are within [0,1] (positive mantissa, negative exponent)
64*/
65e_f64 *fromint_f64_01_vector(int N, e_u32 seed);
66e_f32 *fromint_f32_01_vector(int N, e_u32 seed);
67
68e_f64 *fromint_f64_01_vector_uniform(int N, e_u32 seed);
69e_f32 *fromint_f32_01_vector_uniform(int N, e_u32 seed);
70/* Function: fromint_random_f64_vector
71 Create a vector with randoms based on RNG that was previously allocated for intparts
72 */
73e_f64 *fromint_random_f64_vector(int N,void *pr);
74e_f32 *fromint_random_f32_vector(int N,void *pr);
75
76e_f32 precise_random_f32(void *pr);
77e_f64 precise_random_f64(void *pr);
78#if ( USE_FP64 )
79 #define precise_random_fp precise_random_f64
80 #define fromint_random_fp_vector fromint_random_f64_vector
81 #define fromint_fp_01_vector fromint_f64_01_vector
82 #define fromint_fp_01_vector_uniform fromint_f64_01_vector_uniform
83 #define fromint_fp_vector fromint_f64_vector
84 #define EE_LIMIT_DYNAMIC_RANGE(x) (x)
85#endif
86#if ( USE_FP32 )
87 #define precise_random_fp precise_random_f32
88 #define fromint_random_fp_vector fromint_random_f32_vector
89 #define fromint_fp_01_vector fromint_f32_01_vector
90 #define fromint_fp_01_vector_uniform fromint_f32_01_vector_uniform
91 #define fromint_fp_vector fromint_f32_vector
92 #ifdef TEST_LIMITED_DYNAMIC_RANGE
93 /* Limit to N uppermost bits for the mantissa */
94 #ifndef EE_NUM_LIMIT_BITS
95 #define EE_NUM_LIMIT_BITS 5
96 #endif
97 #define EE_LIMIT_DYNAMIC_RANGE(x) (((1<<EE_NUM_LIMIT_BITS) - 1) << (22-EE_NUM_LIMIT_BITS))
98 #else
99 #define EE_LIMIT_DYNAMIC_RANGE(x) (x)
100 #endif
101#endif
102
103#define random_fp(R) (1.0/(65536.0*65536.0))*random_u32((rand_state *)R)
104#define random_fp_inrange(R) (R)->min+random_fp(R)*(R)->range
105
106typedef enum SIGNRAND_E
107{
108 RAND=0,
109 POS=1,
110 NEG=2
111} SIGNRAND;
112
113e_fp th_exp2(e_fp x);
114e_fp complex_rand_fp(
115 SIGNRAND sign_rand,
116 e_s32 min_exp,
117 e_s32 max_exp,
118 e_u32 meaningfull_bits,
119 void *pr);
120
121#endif //_TH_RAND_H_
